sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row justify="center">
      <v-col cols="12" sm="4" md="6">
        <v-card>
          <v-card-title class="text-h5 text-center">회원가입</v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <v-form @submit.prevent="memberCreate">
              <v-text-field
                  label="이름"
                  v-model="name"
                  required
              >
              </v-text-field>
              <v-text-field
                  label="email"
                  v-model="email"
                  type="email"
                  required
              ></v-text-field>

              <v-text-field
                  label="password"
                  v-model="password"
                  type="password"
                  required
              >
              </v-text-field>
              <v-btn type="submit" color="primary" block>등록</v-btn>
            </v-form>
          </v-card-text>

        </v-card>

      </v-col>

    </v-row>

  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import axios from 'axios';
export default{
  data(){
    return{
      name: "",
      email: "",
      password: "",
    }
  },
  methods:{
    async memberCreate(){
      const data = {
        name: this.name,
        email: this.email,
        password: this.password,

      }
      await axios.post("http://localhost:8080/member/create",data);
      this.$router.push("/");
    }
  }
}


</script>
